SRP.Q: On Aura Finance, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1973 relative to that in 1971 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Aura Finance, the data point in 1973 is {above} and to the {right} of the data point in 1971.

SRP.Q: In 1971, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Titan Lending relative to Aura Finance?
SRP.A: In 1971, Titan Lending is {above} Aura Finance in the vertical direction.
